lazarus_implementation_tools.transformations.ocr package

Submodules

lazarus_implementation_tools.transformations.ocr.easyocr module

lazarus_implementation_tools.transformations.ocr.easyocr.format_ocr_results(results, page_number)[source]

Formats the OCR results for each page.

Parameters:

  • results – (list) A list of tuples containing OCR results for a single page.

  • page_number – (int) The page number.

Returns:

(list) A list of dictionaries containing the OCR data, confidence, and bounding box.

lazarus_implementation_tools.transformations.ocr.easyocr.read_pdf(file_path, start_page=None, end_page=None)[source]

Reads a PDF file and extracts OCR results for each page.

Parameters:

  • file_path – (str) The path to the PDF file.

  • start_page – (int) The starting page number to read. If None, reads from the first page.

  • end_page – (int) The ending page number to read. If None, reads to the last page.

Returns:

(dict) A dictionary containing the OCR results for each page.

lazarus_implementation_tools.transformations.ocr.utils module

lazarus_implementation_tools.transformations.ocr.utils.ocr_pdf(file_path, start_page=None, end_page=None)[source]

Reads a PDF file and extracts OCR results for each page.

Parameters:

  • file_path – (str) The path to the PDF file.

  • start_page – (int) The starting page number to read. If None, reads from the first page.

  • end_page – (int) The ending page number to read. If None, reads to the last page.

Returns:

(dict) A dictionary containing the OCR results for each page.
